factories.name: wall
factories.description: wall factory

factories.name: tank
factories.description: Tanks are good at soaking up damage. They are relevant through all stages of the game.

factories.name: rocket
factories.description: Rockets suicide on collision with an enemy for 150% of their remaining health as damage.

factories.name: lazoid
factories.description: Lazoids are weak but can attack at medium range.

factories.name: medic
factories.description: Medics heal allies at medium range.

factories.name: splitter
factories.description: On death, this minion splits into two. Attacks at medium range.

factories.name: deflector
factories.description: Reflects up to 50% of the damage it receives to the attacker.

factories.name: kite
factories.description: Attacks at rapid speed for low damage at medium range.

factories.name: tankbomb
factories.description: Triggers a massive explosion on death. Is moderately tanky, has no attack.

factories.name: stunner
factories.description: Tanks are good at soaking up damage. They are relevant through all stages of the game.

factories.name: stinger
factories.description: Tanks are good at soaking up damage. They are relevant through all stages of the game.

factories.name: mothership
factories.description: Motherships spawn bullets instead of attacking. Bullets suicide on enemy contact.

factories.name: sawblade
factories.description: Ignores unit collision and does damage per second to all enemies it passes.

factories.name: chakram
factories.description: Shoots bouncing projectiles. Has a very strong early game.

factories.name: shield generator
factories.description: Shields nearby allies.

factories.name: container
factories.description: Does damage per second to all enemies in range.

factories.name: hammerling
factories.description: Reloads slowly, deals massive damage.

factories.name: phaser
factories.description: Beefy allrounder. Damage falls off late game.

factories.name: repeater
factories.description: Attacks at high speed and medium range.

factories.name: freezer
factories.description: Damages all enemies in range and reduces their movement and attack speed.

factories.name: executioner
factories.description: Does triple damage to enemies with slow, stun or root effects..

factories.name: radiator
factories.description: Does damage per second to all enemies in range. High range, low damage. Ignores armor.

factories.name: shotgun
factories.description: Beefy allrounder. Does AOE damage to all units in front of it.

factories.name: sunbeam
factories.description: Increases damage each time it deals damage to the same target, up to 5 times.

factories.name: transceiver
factories.description: Combines all damage taken by allies within range to a massive AOE attack.

factories.name: boomblaster
factories.description: Damages all enemies around it.

factories.name: healer
factories.description: Heal allies around it.

factories.name: healray
factories.description: Heals one ally at medium range.

factories.name: artillery
factories.description: Shoots AOE projectiles. Damage and Range are medium, but it reloads slowly.

factories.name: sniper
factories.description: Has extremely high range. Damage is medium, rate of fire low.

factories.name: lightning
factories.description: Shoots lightning which jumps to close enemies. Can hit every target only once.

factories.name: shuriken
factories.description: Shoots a bouncing projectile. Bounces up to 7 times, can hit the same enemy multiple times.

factories.name: hammerhead
factories.description: Has low range and attack speed, but delivers massive damage.

abilities.name: explode
abilities.description: Deal damage to all enemies within range after 1 second.

abilities.name: demolish
abilities.description: Destroy an empty wall after 1 second. Any players walls can be destroyed.

abilities.name: ionstrike
abilities.description: Destroy everything on a tile after 5 seconds. Does no damage to the core.

abilities.name: farsight
abilities.description: Disable the fog of war in a 2 tile radius; enemies hit take +25% damage for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: hurry
abilities.description: Speed up allies within range by 100% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: slow
abilities.description: Slow enemy units in range by 50% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: frenzy
abilities.description: Increase the attack speed of all allies in range by 50% for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: shield
abilities.description: Shield all allies in range, making them invulnerable for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: stun
abilities.description: Stun all enemies in range for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: mass production
abilities.description: Increase spawn speed of all your minions by 150% for 7 seconds.

abilities.name: adrenaline
abilities.description: Allies in range regenerate 5% of their maximum health per second for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: teleport
abilities.description: Teleport any tower to a random empty wall within its movement range.

abilities.name: lifelink
abilities.description: Allied towers and minions hit share all damage taken for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: wallswap
abilities.description: Swap ownership of the target wall after 1 second. The wall loses half its current health.

abilities.name: exhaust
abilities.description: Decrease the attack speed of all enemies in range by 50% for 5 seconds.

emotes.emote: Your defeat will be my pleasure!

achievements.title: Tower Army
achievements.description: Win a match with towers only.

achievements.title: Minion Army
achievements.description: Win a match with minions only.

achievements.title: Clean Victory
achievements.description: Win a match with your core unharmed.

achievements.title: Comeback
achievements.description: Win a match with your core at 25% health.

achievements.title: Ultimate Comeback
achievements.description: Win a match with your core at 10% health.

achievements.title: Open Spaces
achievements.description: Win a match without building walls

achievements.title: Perfectionist
achievements.description: Win a match with all factories fully upgraded.

achievements.title: Winning Streak
achievements.description: Win 3 PVP matches in a row.

achievements.title: Hot Streak
achievements.description: Win 5 PVP matches in a row.

achievements.title: Blazing Streak
achievements.description: Win 10 PVP matches in a row.

achievements.title: Unbeatable
achievements.description: Win 20 PVP matches in a row.

achievements.title: Treasure Chest
achievements.description: Have an active boost of every kind.

achievements.title: MVP V
achievements.description: Rank within the top 100 at the end of a season.

achievements.title: MVP IV
achievements.description: Rank within the top 50 at the end of a season.

achievements.title: MVP III
achievements.description: Rank within the top 25 at the end of a season.

achievements.title: MVP II
achievements.description: Rank within the top 10 at the end of a season.

achievements.title: MVP I
achievements.description: End a season as the highest ranking player.
